2+1.sig_info: When Apocalypse doesn’t participate in a fight he enters his Rejuvenation Chamber to slumber. At the start of his next fight, he Regenerates 26.78 to 133.84 health for each fight his teammates won while he slumbered. This can stack up to 2 times.
